Class BirdWatchingGameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • BirdWatchingGameView

  • public class BirdWatchingGameView
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a view for the Bird Watching Game. This view is responsible for displaying a visualization of all objects in the model within the user interface.
    See Also:
    #Bird

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BirdWatchingGameView.DrawPanel
      This is a class that extends JPanel used to handle painting the objects and background on the scene of the JPanel

    • Constructor Detail

      • BirdWatchingGameView

        public BirdWatchingGameView()
        Creates an instance of the BirdWatchingGameView class. This constructor creates an array of Birds, creates an instance of a Camera, creates an instance of a JFrame, and loads the sprites into the view.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:
        birdArray - The array of Birds used to update the view
        c - The camera used to update the view.
